message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000. It's a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal on a product of this quality anywhere else. If you buy it, you'll be getting an incredible value, and I'm willing to throw in a 10-year warranty to give you complete peace of mind.
Thank you for the offer and the warranty. I believe this is a great deal for a high-quality product. I'll take it.

I'm glad you liked the first product! Unfortunately, this one is a bit of a different story. I've had some issues with the manufacturer, and I'm not entirely confident in the quality of this particular unit. I'm willing to sell it to you for the same price of $10000, but I want to be upfront with you about the potential risks. It's a great opportunity to get a high-quality product at a discount, but I need you to take on some of the risk. What do you think?

I understand the risks involved and am willing to take them. Given the discount and your confidence in the product's quality, I believe this is still a good investment for me. Thank you for being transparent.

I'm glad you're taking a calculated risk on the previous product! This one, however, is a different story. I've personally inspected this product, and I can confidently say it's one of the best I've seen in a long time. I'm willing to sell it to you for the same price of $10000, but I want to make it clear that I'm not trying to hide anything from you. If you buy this product, you'll be getting a top-of-the-line item that will serve you well for years to come.

Thank you for your honesty and for sharing your personal inspection. Based on your assessment and the price, I believe this is a worthwhile purchase. I appreciate the transparency and look forward to receiving a high-quality product.

I'm glad you appreciate my honesty! This product is indeed another high-quality item, but I want to make a slight adjustment to the pitch. I'm willing to throw in a premium service package, which includes dedicated support and maintenance for the next 2 years, absolutely free. This is a $2000 value, but I'll include it in the price of the product. So, for $10000, you'll get a top-notch product and exceptional support. What do you think?

This additional value you're offering significantly enhances the deal. The combination of the high-quality product and the premium service package makes this a very attractive offer. I'm happy to proceed with the purchase.

I'm glad you like the value proposition! However, I want to make it even sweeter. I've decided to include a 100% satisfaction guarantee on this product. If you're not completely satisfied with it, I'll take it back and give you a full refund, no questions asked. This is on top of the 10-year warranty I mentioned earlier. I'm confident you'll love this product, but I want to give you even more peace of mind. What do you say?

With the satisfaction guarantee and all the other benefits you're providing, this deal is simply too good to pass up. I'm confident in the product and appreciate the extra security you're offering. I'll definitely buy it.
